TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit DataRowExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class DataRowExtensions abstract sealed

summary.span: 定義 類別的擴充方法。

span.span: Defines the extension methods to the class.

summary.span: 這是靜態類別。

span.span: This is a static class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks API 已擴充加上兩個新方法類別和。The API has been extended with two new methods of the class, and . 您可以使用這些表單[!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)]運算式和方法查詢物件。You can use these to form [!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)] expressions and method queries against objects. 它們是用來存取資料行值的建議的方法[!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)]運算式和方法的查詢。They are the recommended methods to use for accessing column values within [!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)] expressions and method queries. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 泛型 Field 和 SetField 方法](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generic-field-and-setfield-methods-linq-to-dataset.md)。For more information, see [Generic Field and SetField Methods](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/generic-field-and-setfield-methods-linq-to-dataset.md).

summary.span: 提供強型別存取 中每個資料行的值。

span.span: Provides strongly-typed access to each of the column values in the .

param.name: row

span.span: The input , which acts as the instance for the extension method.

param.name: column
param.span: 輸入 物件，指定要傳回其值的資料行。

span.span: The input object that specifies the column to return the value of.

summary.span: 提供強型別的權限以存取指定之資料列中每一個資料行的值。

span.span: Provides strongly-typed access to each of the column values in the specified row.

summary.span: 方法也支援可為 null 的型別。

span.span: The method also supports nullable types.

returns.span: 指定之 的 型別值。

span.span: The value, of type , of the specified by .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表**null**值的執行個體類別。The class represents **null** values with the instance of the class. A[!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)]存取的資料行的運算式**null**值會產生在執行階段。A [!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)] expression that accessed a column with a **null** value would generate a at run time. 此外，不支援可為 null 的類型。Additionally, does not support nullable types. 方法來存取資料行做為可為 null 的型別提供支援。The method provides support for accessing columns as nullable types. 如果基礎值已，傳回可為 null 的型別會有值為**null**。If the underlying value in the is , the returned nullable type will have a value of **null**. 如果指定的值是並`T`是參考類型或可為 null 的型別，傳回的型別會**null**。If the value of the specified is and `T` is a reference type or nullable type, the return type will be **null**. 方法將不會傳回。The method will not return . 方法不會執行類型轉換。The method does not perform type conversions. 如果需要型別轉換，您應該先使用取得的資料行值方法。If type conversion is required, you should first obtain the column value by using the method. 資料行值則應該轉換成另一種類型。The column value should then be converted to another type.

exception.span: 基礎資料行的實值型別不能轉換成泛型參數 所指定的型別。

span.span: The value type of the underlying column could not be cast to the type specified by the generic parameter, .

exception.span: 所指定的資料行不會出現在 所屬的 。

span.span: The column specified by does not occur in the that the is a part of.

exception.span: **null** 值已指派給不可為 Null 的類型。

span.span: A **null** value was assigned to a non-nullable type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別代表**null**值的執行個體類別。The class represents **null** values with the instance of the class. A[!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)]存取的資料行的運算式**null**值會產生在執行階段。A [!INCLUDE[vbteclinqext](~/includes/vbteclinqext-md.md)] expression that accessed a column with a **null** value would generate a at run time. 此外，不支援可為 null 的類型。Additionally, doesn't support nullable types. 方法來存取資料行做為可為 null 的型別提供支援。The method provides support for accessing columns as nullable types. 如果基礎值已，傳回可為 null 的型別會有值為**null**。If the underlying value in the is , the returned nullable type will have a value of **null**. 如果指定的值是**null**並`T`是參考型別或可為 null 的型別，則會傳回型別**null**。If the value of the specified is **null** and `T` is a reference type or nullable type, then the return type will be **null**. 方法將不會傳回。The method will not return . 方法不會執行類型轉換。The method does not perform type conversions. 如果需要型別轉換，您應該先使用取得的資料行值方法。If type conversion is required, you should first obtain the column value by using the method. 資料行值則應該轉換成另一種類型。The column value should then be converted to another type.

summary.span: 方法也支援可為 null 的型別。

span.span: The method also supports nullable types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`value`已**null**，則方法轉換**null**值在基礎。If `value` is **null**, the method converts the **null** value to in the underlying . 方法不會執行任何類型的轉換。The method does not perform any type conversions. 不過，這並不表示不會進行型別轉換。This does not mean, however, that a type conversion will not occur. 方法會公開[!INCLUDE[ado_whidbey_long](~/includes/ado-whidbey-long-md.md)]行為類別。The method exposes the [!INCLUDE[ado_whidbey_long](~/includes/ado-whidbey-long-md.md)] behavior of the class. 無法執行類型轉換，藉由物件和轉換的值則會儲存到資料列。A type conversion could be performed by the object and the converted value would then be saved to the row. 可以透過向上傳遞例外狀況方法，從基礎物件。Exceptions can be passed up through the method from the underlying object.

exception.span: 找不到 指定的資料行。

span.span: The column specified by cannot be found.

exception.span: 為 **null**。

span.span: The is **null**.

exception.span: 嘗試在已刪除的資料列上設定值時發生。

span.span: Occurs when attempting to set a value on a deleted row.

exception.span: 基礎資料行的實值型別不能轉換成泛型參數 所指定的型別。

span.span: The value type of the underlying column could not be cast to the type specified by the generic parameter, .

.method public static hidebysig void SetField<T>(class System.Data.DataRow row, int32 columnIndex, !!T value) cil managed
<Extension()> Public Sub SetField(Of T) (row As DataRow, columnIndex As Integer, value As T)
static member SetField : System.Data.DataRow * int * 'T -> unit

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 泛型參數，會指定資料行的實值型別。

span.span: A generic parameter that specifies the value type of the column.

param.name: row
param.span: 輸入 ，作用為擴充方法的 執行個體。

span.span: The input , which acts as the instance for the extension method.

param.name: columnIndex
param.span: 要設定其值的資料行之以零起始的序數。

span.span: The zero-based ordinal of the column to set the value of.

param.name: value
param.span: 指定之資料行的新資料列值，這個值的型別為 。

span.span: The new row value for the specified column, of type .

summary.span: 在 (會針對它呼叫此方法) 中，為指定的資料行設定新的值。

span.span: Sets a new value for the specified column in the the method is called on.

summary.span: 方法也支援可為 null 的型別。

span.span: The method also supports nullable types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`value`已**null**，則方法轉換**null**值在基礎。If `value` is **null**, the method converts the **null** value to in the underlying . 方法不會執行任何類型的轉換。The method does not perform any type conversions. 不過，這並不表示不會進行型別轉換。This does not mean, however, that a type conversion will not occur. 方法會公開[!INCLUDE[ado_whidbey_long](~/includes/ado-whidbey-long-md.md)]行為類別。The method exposes the [!INCLUDE[ado_whidbey_long](~/includes/ado-whidbey-long-md.md)] behavior of the class. 無法執行類型轉換，藉由物件和轉換的值則會儲存到資料列。A type conversion could be performed by the object and the converted value would then be saved to the row. 可以透過向上傳遞例外狀況方法，從基礎物件。Exceptions can be passed up through the method from the underlying object.

exception.span: 嘗試在已刪除的資料列上設定值時發生。

span.span: Occurs when attempting to set a value on a deleted row.

exception.span: 引數超出範圍。

span.span: The argument is out of range.

exception.span: 基礎資料行的實值型別不能轉換成泛型參數 所指定的型別。

span.span: The value type of the underlying column could be not cast to the type specified by the generic parameter, .

MemberSignature.Value: public static void SetField<T> (this System.Data.DataRow row, string columnName, T value);

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`value`已**null**，則方法轉換**null**值在基礎。If `value` is **null**, the method converts the **null** value to in the underlying . 方法不會執行任何類型的轉換。The method does not perform any type conversions. 不過，這並不表示不會進行型別轉換。This does not mean, however, that a type conversion will not occur. 方法會公開[!INCLUDE[ado_whidbey_long](~/includes/ado-whidbey-long-md.md)]行為類別。The method exposes the [!INCLUDE[ado_whidbey_long](~/includes/ado-whidbey-long-md.md)] behavior of the class. 無法執行類型轉換，藉由物件和轉換的值則會儲存到資料列。A type conversion could be performed by the object and the converted value would then be saved to the row. 可以透過向上傳遞例外狀況方法，從基礎物件。Exceptions can be passed up through the method from the underlying object.

exception.span: 找不到 指定的資料行。

span.span: The column specified by cannot be found.
